PEG7 Giycery cocpate Cleanses and hydrates the skin
C14-75 Dialkyi Carbonate Enhances the spreadability of the product on the skin

Decyl Glus9side A gentle surfactant that helps to cleanse the skin
eEG-20 Glyceryi Trlsostearate Helps to emulsify and stabilize the product formula
o yg-aternfimn-51 An emulsifier that helps to stabilize the product formula

Fragrance Provides a pleasant scent to the product
Sodium Hydroxide Helps to balance the pH of the product formula

To get the best results from our product, we recommend the following usage and care instructions:

  • Apply a small amount of product to damp skin.
  • Gently massage the product onto your skin using circular motions.
  • Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.
  • Pat your skin dry with a clean towel.
  • Store the product in a cool, dry place.
  • Avoid getting the product in your eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.

settings.sub_contact_message:
We are always happy to hear from our customers. Whether you have a question about our products, need help with an order, or just want to say hello, our team is here to assist you. Feel free to reach out to us

Our customer service team is available from Monday to Friday, 9:00am - 5:00pm EST. We strive to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.

You can also connect with us on social media for updates on our latest products and promotions.

settings.newsletter_form_heading: Be the first to know when we launch.

settings.item_title: What is your exchange policy?
settings.item_content: We hope you like our products as much as we do. If not, please leave us a message at hello@aliasgoodskin.com and we will reach out to you for a refund in store credits.

settings.item_title: What are the delivery options and when can I receive my order(s)?
settings.item_content: We hope you are looking forward to your order!

settings.item_title: Where do you ship to?
settings.item_content:
We are working hard with our logistics partner to build our network locations internationally.

If you are outside of Singapore, please send us an email at hello@aliasgoodskin.com

settings.item_title: How long does it take to process my order?
settings.item_content:
You should receive an order confirmation after checking out successfully. 

We take 1-2 business days to process your order (local). Once your order is ready for shipping, you will receive an email with your shipment tracking number. If you do not receive your shipment tracking number within 2 business days, please contact us at hello@aliasgoodskin.com

settings.item_title: I made a mistake in my shipping address.
settings.item_content: Please contact us immediately at hello@aliasgoodskin.com and we will help you sort it out.

settings.item_title: I have not received my order.
settings.item_content:
If you have a shipment tracking number, please allow up to 7 business days for delivery to be made. If you do not receive your order after that, please contact us at hello@aliasgoodskin.com.

If you do not have a shipment tracking number, please contact us at hello@aliasgoodskin.com to confirm your order has been processed.

settings.item_title: What forms of payment do you accept?
settings.item_content:
We accept Visa, Mastercard, PayNow (Singapore only).

Unfortunately we do not currently accept cash orders or cheques.

settings.item_title: Are your products cruelty-free?
settings.item_content: Yes, of course! We respect animal rights and do not condone any form of animal cruelty.

settings.item_title: Are your products safe for use for all ages?
settings.item_content: Yes, our products are safe for all ages.

settings.item_title: Are your products completely natural/organic?
settings.item_content:
We emphasise the use of high-quality ingredients and it is as much important for our formulation to be safe, stable and effective for your skin.

Not all natural ingredients are safe. Rest assured that our ingredients are tested to be skin-gentle, so you can use our products with peace of mind.

settings.item_title: If I have oily/combination skin, can I use an oil cleanser?
settings.item_content: Yes, in fact oil cleanser can be beneficial for oily/combination skin and with regular use, it can regulate sebum production, which means less oily skin!

settings.item_title: Do I need a second cleanse after using the Glow Honey Gel to Oil cleanser?
settings.item_content: With the gel-based formula, all residue is completely washed off in a single cleanse. Your skin will feel clean and refreshed in a single wash, no need for a second cleanse.

settings.item_title: If I'm wearing waterproof/long-wearing make-up, can the Glow Honey Gel to Oil cleanser really remove everything?
settings.item_content:
We have tested various brands of make-up, including long-wearing foundation, mascara, eyeliner and bold colored lipsticks. Our Glow Honey Gel to Oil cleanser can easily remove each of them, but we would recommend using more product (about 1.5 teaspoon) for better emulsification.

We also noticed for eye make-up, you can more gently remove them by using the Cloud No.9 Cleansing Puff together with the Glow Honey Gel to Oil cleanser.

settings.item_title: Where is the Glow Honey Gel to Oil cleanser made?
settings.item_content: It's made in Japan, co-formulated with our R&D partner.

settings.item_title: What are the ingredients used?
settings.item_content: The Glow Honey Gel to Oil Cleanser features the following ingredients: Honey, Peony Root Extract, Meadowfoam Seed Oil and Sodium PCA.

settings.item_title: How do I wash the cleansing puffs?
settings.item_content:
You can either hand wash them or put them in the washing machine. Please do not put them with white clothing.

After each wash, remember to dry them completely to minimise odours.

settings.item_title: How often should I wash each cleansing puff?
settings.item_content: We recommend washing them after 2-3 uses.

settings.item_title: How many times can I wash each cleansing puff?
settings.item_content:
Each puff is can be washed up to 150 times.

A pack of cleansing puff can last you almost a year! This also makes our Cloud No.9 Cleansing Puff a more eco-friendly and sustainable option to make-up wipes, plus save you money too.

settings.item_title: Do you have any discounts or promo codes that I can use for my order?
settings.item_content:
Yes! We will share the latest with you on our social media pages and emailers.

Sign up for an account to receive exclusive offers: 

Follow us on Instagram and stay up-to-date with latest offers @alias.goodskin

settings.text_content:
Welcome to our website, where we offer the best products and services in the industry. Our mission is to provide you with exceptional quality and customer service that exceeds your expectations.

At our company, we take pride in offering a wide range of products that cater to your needs. From skincare products to beauty tools, we have everything you need to look and feel your best. We source our products from trusted suppliers, and we make sure that every product is of the highest quality.

Our team is made up of experts in the industry, who are dedicated to providing you with the best service possible. We take the time to understand your needs and preferences, and we are always happy to answer any questions you may have.

We are committed to building long-term relationships with our customers. That's why we offer a range of services that are designed to make your shopping experience as easy and convenient as possible. From fast and reliable shipping to hassle-free returns, we do everything we can to ensure that you are completely satisfied with your purchase.

We believe that everyone deserves to feel confident and beautiful. That's why we offer affordable products that are designed to help you look and feel your best. We are passionate about what we do, and we are committed to making a difference in the lives of our customers.

Thank you for choosing us for your beauty needs. We look forward to serving you and helping you achieve your beauty goals.

settings.title: About Alias for good skin products

settings.item_title: If I have oily/combination skin, can I use an oil cleanser?
settings.item_content: Yes, in fact oil cleanser can be beneficial for oily/combination skin and with regular use, it can regulate sebum production, which means less oily skin!

settings.item_title: Do I need a second cleanse after using the Glow Honey Gel to Oil cleanser?
settings.item_content:
With the gel-based formula, all residue is completely washed off in a single cleanse. Your skin will feel clean and refreshed in a single wash, no need for a second cleanse.

You can learn more about the benefits of oil cleansing on our Glowing Skin blog.

settings.item_title: If I'm wearing waterproof/long-wearing make-up, can the Glow Honey Gel to Oil cleanser really remove everything?
settings.item_content:
We have tested various brands of make-up, including long-wearing foundation, mascara, eyeliner and bold colored lipsticks. Our Glow Honey Gel to Oil cleanser can easily remove each of them, but we would recommend using more product (about 1.5 teaspoon) for better emulsification.

We also noticed for eye make-up, you can more gently remove them by using the Cloud No.9 Cleansing Puff together with the Glow Honey Gel to Oil cleanser.

If you regularly wear mascara/eyeliner, you should try our Best Seller bundle.

settings.item_title: Where is the Glow Honey Gel to Oil cleanser made?
settings.item_content: It's made in Japan, co-formulated with our R&D partner.

settings.item_title: What are the ingredients used?
settings.item_content:
Our hero ingredients include Honey, Peony Root Extract, Meadowfoam Seed Oil and Sodium PCA.

Learn more about their benefits here.

settings.title: About Glow Honey Gel to Oil cleanser

settings.item_title: How do I wash the cleansing puffs?
settings.item_content:
You can either hand wash them or put them in the washing machine. Please do not put them with white clothing.

After each wash, remember to dry them completely to minimize odors.

settings.item_title: How often should I wash each cleansing puff?
settings.item_content: We recommend washing them after 2-3 use.

settings.item_title: How many times can I wash each cleansing puff?
settings.item_content:
Each puff is can be washed up to 150x.

A pack of cleansing puff can last you almost a year! This also makes our Cloud No.9 Cleansing Puff a more eco-friendly and sustainable option to make-up wipes, plus save you more money too.

Get your Cloud No.9 Cleansing Puff here.

Or you can enjoy more savings with our Best seller bundle.

settings.newsletter_desc: Get glowing with our latest products and exclusive events.

settings.block_desc: Every scoop of Living Cleansing Balm is a sensorial experience — gliding onto skin to gently melt away makeup, sunscreen and oil-based impurities while restoring vital moisture.

settings.block_rev: Then I Met You Living Cleansing Balm is widely worshipped for a reason. The velvety formula melts away makeup, promotes calm, and practically turns washing your face into a purification ritual.
Periwinkle blue and sunshine yellow is a color combo now synonymous with Then I Met You.
My favorite part about this moisturizer definitely has to be its gel texture — it's super cooling and lightweight, and it transforms into cloud-like water as it absorbs into the skin.
Charlotte Cho's new double cleanser is a cult product in the making.
